title: Ece in pes south campus or ece in BMSCE
content: Which one should I go for.

comments.body: ECE at PES ECC is the worst decision you can make. The HOD is a fatass retard. Pick BMCSE or even ECE at RR if you get it.
What difference does ECE at RR and EC Campus make? The exam is the same, teachers are similar, placement oppurtunity is the same...

The ECE dept in ECC is a lot stricter than RR from what I’ve heard from all of my friends. They call your parents if you mess around and all and they catch you if you bunk classes because they take it seriously

You’re right that the difference is minimal, but just be prepared bc it won’t be easy

The opportunity is not the same. There are some interactions and talks given in the campuses that is not available in the other campus. The club opportunity is also very different. Choose rr if you can.
I was referring to the placement opportunities... but the other opportunities RR might be slightly better when it comes to clubs, talks and peer group.. ig I can go without that..

ECE in PESU EC campus, they stopped calling it south campus now btw.  
PESU syllabus is better. Teacher suck everywhere tho.
